name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, migrant workers demanded their wages at Fuzhou High-tech Zone No. 1 Middle School (formerly Fuzhou Minhou County No. 3 Middle School).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 27, Shanghai.
A man yelled, "The crime of provoking disturbances is unprecedented in the world. You can arrest people at will."
Then the man yelled at the security checkpoint, "Kill me, shoot me, I don't want to live anymore."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 27th, the head of the Nantong Civil Affairs Bureau responded to the ban on the production and sale of paper money for the dead, saying: "We emphasize the prohibition of manufacturing and sales from the perspective of market behavior, but we did not prohibit the use", which caused ridicule from netizens.
In response, netizens replied, "We do not allow restaurants to open, but we do not prohibit citizens from eating out", "It is prohibited to grow crops, but not to eat", "Mobility scooters for the elderly can be produced but not purchased and used"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China Merchants Bank reversely asks employees for 43.29 million yuan in wages
Recently, in the 2023 annual report released by China Merchants Bank, a striking data is the record of the bank's recovery of wages from employees.
According to the annual report, in 2023, China Merchants Bank executed performance-based salary recovery and deduction for 4,415 employees, with a total amount of 43.29 million yuan in performance-based salary recovered

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 28, a fire broke out in the Jinxiang Chemical Park in Meishan, Sichuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, Dongfang City, Hainan. Huiyi Blue Bay had not delivered its property for eight years, so the owners came to the Dongfang Municipal People's Government to defend their rights and demanded to see the mayor. During the process, some owners were forcibly taken away by the police, and some were sprayed with pepper spray by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, in Jinan, Shandong, a petitioner posted a video saying that a group of idle people were standing outside the Shandong Provincial People's Government. Whenever someone got off a car outside the gate of the Shandong Provincial People's Government, they would surround them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 28, a fire broke out near Tianyangcheng in Sanhe City, Yanjiao, Hebei Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, it was reported on the Internet that the government of Aizhai Town in Xiangxi, Hunan, forcibly demolished the houses of local residents without any legal documents in order to build the Daxingzhai Reservoir project, causing dissatisfaction and protests among residents.
The video showed that fierce conflicts and pushing broke out between the residents and the police, and the staff took the residents away regardless of their pleas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A video said that the Daxingzhai Reservoir Project is located in Aizhai Town, Jishou City. After the completion of the reservoir, it will improve the flood control capacity of Jishou City and provide 285,000 tons of high-quality clean water for Jishou City every day. However, local residents in the message area said, "We are all 70 years old and have never encountered a flood." "If we seize basic farmland, our descendants will starve in the future?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ying32178493 Don't be too harsh, the abbreviations are just for locals to ensure that the video is not censored with sensitive words

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 23 (Release), Hebi, Henan. It was reported online that a 22-year-old female student from Hebi Vocational College jumped into the river after being bullied by her roommate. In the video, rescuers were salvaging in the river.
According to the family of the student who jumped into the river, her sister Hong Yipei had repeatedly reported to the counselor that her roommate smoked in the dormitory and asked the counselor to change the dormitory, but the counselor just asked her to be more tolerant and inclusive and said that there were no extra beds. The chat records circulated online showed that Hong Yipei was also insulted by her roommates before her death. On March 20, because her roommate placed a dirty clothes basket in the public area, after a quarrel with her roommate, Hong Yipei, who was emotionally broken, applied to the counselor to go home, but the counselor did not agree. At 14:04 noon, Hong Yipei transferred all the money in her mobile phone to her family on the Chaogeli Bridge, and after sending her last words to her mother and counselor, she jumped into the river to commit suicide. Before Hong Yipei committed suicide, she posted the last post on Weibo, which revealed that she was bullied by her classmates...
fullContent:
3月23日 (发布)，河南鹤壁。 网传鹤壁职业学院一名22岁的女学生被室友霸凌后跳河，视频中，救援人员正在河里打捞。
据跳河学生的家属称，她的妹妹洪伊培生前曾多次向辅导员反映室友在宿舍抽烟的情况，并请求辅导员换宿舍，但辅导员只是让她多容忍和包容，并表示没有多余的床位。网传的聊天记录显示，洪伊培生前还曾遭到室友们的辱骂。3月20日，因室友在公共区域放置了脏衣篓，在和室友吵了一架后，情绪崩溃的洪伊培向辅导员申请回家，但辅导员未同意。中午14时04分，洪伊培在朝歌里大桥上将手机里的钱全部转给家人，并给母亲和辅导员发完遗言后，跳河轻生。洪伊培轻生前，在微博发了最后一条帖子，帖子里透露她被同学霸凌的情况，她表示“还有很多，我不想记住的，可是这辈子都忘不了，希望下辈子不来了，对不起爸爸妈妈”
 3月24日，家属发贴称“别人可以发，但我们亲人不允许发，已发的被要求下架”
 3月27日，家属再次发视频称，他们被人跟踪，今天是第八天。视频显示，一辆白色商务车紧紧的跟在身后，家属靠边停车后，身后的白车也跟着靠边停靠。
 3月27日，记者联系到鹤壁职业技术学院的一名工作人员，他表示，从事发到现在，学校一直在跟进处理此事，但暂时还没有一个处理结果。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 28, when Yu Minhong was interviewing Geely Automobile Chairman Li Shufu live, the live broadcast room was temporarily banned because Li Shufu mentioned "June 4th" three times during the live broadcast.
